ComicInfo.Title: The Survivors!; Return from the Grave!; Volcano of Doom!; Found: The Lair of the Snow Monster!!!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Survivors!: A time capsule containing astronauts is opened by a huge fanged ape like monster. The astronauts awaken and fight for their lives trapped in a future World inhabited by these monsters that were once human. Eventually all the astronauts are killed except for one, who tragically turns into one of the monsters himself.
Return from the Grave!: A stage magician's apprentice purposely lets his master die doing a escape so he can take over his act. The magician returns from the grave to exact revenge.
Volcano of Doom!: Mala, god of the volcano, is angered when a village sacrifices his representatives to the volcano and causes the dead to return from their graves to haunt the village.
Found: The Lair of the Snow Monster!!!: Four explorers, in a remote corner of Tibet, unleash a monster that devours three of them.
